column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Downstairs has the same menu as upstairs
column2: but the vibe is very different.  Upstairs is kind of turn-of-the-century
column4: vaulted ceilings.  Downstairs is shorter ceilings
column7: and more modern.  Not thumping music or anything
column8: but definitely not the same vintage decor.  More like vintage touches.
